title: April 25th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:title: April 25th - Basic Bitch Quickie (BBQ) Weekly Roundup
itunes:subtitle: Kardashian family update, Johnny Depp & Amber Heard trial, Will & Jada Smith debacle continues, & Nene Leakes sues Bravo
description:
This week the basic and the brain are coming at you live from LA and in a big girl studio. #Movingonup! For BBQ's this week, we're talking through a wide range of topics, from another one of our infamous Kardashian Family updates to discussing legal woes for Bravo and across Johnny Depp & the Amber Heard trial. See below for the topics of the week:


Kardashian Family Update

  • Blac Chyna vs. Kardashian Family trial she hasn't paid her taxes, rob's revenge porn incident, Chyna threatening rob with a gun and cord around his neck + much more)
  • Scott Disick responds to news that both his exes are engaged within 6 months of each other (Kourtney Kardashian & Sofia Richie)


Johnny Depp versus Amber Heard Trial

  • Crazy text exchange between Paul Bettany and Jonny Depp
  • Amber Heard Turd
  • Milani Cosmetics comes out swinging on TikTok in defense of Johnny


Will Smith & Jada Debacle continued

  • Netflix cancels Will Smith's sequel to 2017 action film 'Bright' and National Geographic delays production on 'Pole to Pole' after he slapped Chris Rock at the Oscars
  • Will & Jada Divorce Rumors are spreading as fallout of Oscars slap continues



Nene Leakes and Real Housewives

  • Nene Leakes sues Bravo & Andy Cohen over alleged racist and hostile work environment




Don't forget to follow us, review our podcast and subscribe on our socials!

  • Twitter: @BasicandBrain
  • Instagram: @TheBasicandTheBrain
  • TikTok: @thebasic_and_thebrain
  • Website: thebasicandthebrain.com



Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
